Are you sure you want to go online?

The website is an internet-based portal having existence on the World Wide Web, Applications, and other electronic mediums which provide astrological content. The website is offering ‘Free services’ and ‘Paid Services’ too. Free services are easy to access. And for paid services, you will have to become a member. And to become a member, you will have to register for our paid services. There is an agreement for members who want to get access to services.In order to reach the website, there are some ways to reach it smoothly. Providing correct information and giving the proper guidance to the customers is necessary. Therefore, we provide the information related to the website and register the website. For registration, there is some information that will be applicable to the customers for new registration. This process includes personal information like; email address, contact number, bank account details, and many more in terms of providing the services set by the website. In terms of getting you connected with us and you want to get connected with us, the Privacy policy of this website includes all the personal information of the user/customer. The website makes sure that the information provided by the customer/user is correct and relevant for becoming a member. Also, visit…… Talk to Astrologers Customers/users should know about? The information provided by the customer/user to the website is disposable to the third party if needed in serious issues. The website cannot give the commitment of keeping all the personal and communicative details according to the privacy policy of the website.Even though we commit to protecting the information provided by you, we cannot promise you. Being a user of the information will remain secure as you register to the website and your consent is taken during the registration process. Clicking on Agree button sets the lock for your personal information so that the third party cannot open it. The website is not responsible for medical advice. If provided by a third party or service provider and astrologers on the site. An astrologer does not provide you with specific tests, treatments, and medicines. Bank details (Credit card/Debit card) The website is allowing access to the user who has registered to the account and is provided with the information. Therefore, users give consent to unconditional access to the account by the website, agents, employees, or authorized person. For the purpose of addressing the complaints, abuse, and violation of rights the website has the authority to have an investigation and action with the help of available records.\n The user is directed to use the Terms and conditions of the Privacy Policy.Also, visit…. Thearchryamukti.com Contact Information and ProcessThe website is providing such services which are available through the medium of telecommunication with the Astrologers who are listed in the website. By agreeing with the current Terms and conditions on usage, you are naturally giving your unconditional consent to the website to arrange the call with you on your cell phone number or DND service provider number. User’s consent Once you access the website and start using it, clicking on ‘I AGREE’ will show that you are agreeing to all the terms and conditions of the website. If you are not agreeing with the terms and conditions of the website, do not press or click on the ‘I Agree’ button. Once you click you will be shown all the terms and conditions of the website. The page will open.
Discontinuation
The website may discontinue, modify, change or send alerts to the services or the account of a user registered with the website. The website may issue or may not issue the notice or provide any reason for such actions taken by the website. The website reserves right to terminate and initiate actions immediately.
